https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ytnhzdwtj0YfC5NVWrrPRGSGZb7.jpg Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger. Black Widow
